content:
Fellow Madisonians! Microsoft is hosting a HealthTech MeetUp on Tuesday the 28th at the Microsoft office. I'll be giving a similar presentation to the one I gave at DevDays in Amsterdam. Join us for a night of mingling with local health technology players (and learn about what's happening with SMART Web Messaging in FHIR).
https://www.meetup.com/Madison-Health-Tech/events/267513481
